snippet: Joseph J. Lhota officially entered the mayor’s race Thursday, changing the texture and character of a campaign dominated by Democratic elected officials.
abstract: Outspoken Republican Joseph J Lhota officially enters New York City mayor’s race; his entry changes character of campaign that has been dominated by Democratic elected officials.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

lead_paragraph: Joseph J. Lhota officially entered the mayor’s race Thursday, changing the texture and character of a campaign dominated by Democratic elected officials.

headline.seo: Lhota Joins Mayoral Race, and Stands Out
headline.main: Outsize Personality Joins, and Jostles, Mayor’s Race
headline.print_headline: An Outsize Personality Joins, And Jostles, the Mayor’s Race
